amendment.description: An amendment printed in Part A of House Report 113-1 and made in order as original text for the purpose of further amendment. Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 23, after consideration and disposition of the Mulvaney amendment, the Chair will be required to put the question on adoption of the Rogers (KY) text, as amended, or not.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in Part A of House Report 113-1 and made in order as original text for the purpose of further amendment. Pursuant to the provisions of H. Res. 23, after consideration and disposition of the Mulvaney amendment, the Chair will be required to put the question on adoption of the Rogers (KY) text, as amended, or not.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rogers (KY) amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 327 - 91 (Roll no. 15).
